variable.name: FORM
variable.description: EDIC form number

variable.name: CLINIC
variable.description: A1. Identifying information. Deidentified EDIC clinic number

variable.name: EDICYEAR
variable.description: EDIC year

variable.name: EDICYRB
variable.description: Last EDIC year

variable.name: IAB0A
variable.description: Recognition of event: CVA (cerebrovascular accident)

variable.name: IAB0B
variable.description: B0a. Recognition of event: TIA (transient ischemic attack)

variable.name: IAB1B
variable.description: B1b. Recognition of event: if date uncertain, check here

variable.name: IAB3
variable.description: B3. Recognition of event. How did clinic learn of the event
variable.value: Annual medical history and physical exam
Clinic recognized event and informed patient

variable.name: IAB4A
variable.description: B4a. Recognition of event. Was the patient treated within a health care facility for this event: emergency room

variable.name: IAB4B
variable.description: B4b. Recognition of event. Was the patient treated within a health care facility for this event: inpatient hospitalization

variable.name: IAB4C
variable.description: B4c. Recognition of event. Was the patient treated within a health care facility for this event: deidentified EDIC clinic

variable.name: IAB4D
variable.description: B4d. Recognition of event. Was the patient treated within a health care facility for this event: other facility

variable.name: IAC1A1
variable.description: C1a1. Cerebrovascular accident: weakness or numbness in contralateral limbs

variable.name: IAC1A2
variable.description: C1a2. Cerebrovascular accident: contralateral homonymous hemianopsia

variable.name: IAC1A3
variable.description: C1a3. Cerebrovascular accident: carotid arterial system, dsyphasia

variable.name: IAC1A4
variable.description: Ca4. Cerebrovascular accident: carotid arterial system, agnosia

variable.name: IAC1B1
variable.description: C1b1. Cerebrovascular accident. Arterial system: weakness single/limbs

variable.name: IAC1B2
variable.description: C1b2. Cerebrovascular accident. Arterial system: numbness of the face

variable.name: IAC1B3
variable.description: C1b3. Cerebrovascular accident. Arterial system: diplopia

variable.name: IAC1B4
variable.description: C1b4. Cerebrovascular accident. Arterial system: dysphagia

variable.name: IAC1B5
variable.description: C1b5. Cerebrovascular accident. Arterial system: dysarthria

variable.name: IAC1B6
variable.description: C1b6. Cerebrovascular accident. Arterial system: hemonymous hemianopsia

variable.name: IAC1B7
variable.description: C1b7. Cerebrovascular accident. Arterial system: ataxia

variable.name: IAC1B8
variable.description: C1b8. Cerebrovascular accident. Arterial system: nystagmus

variable.name: IAC1B9
variable.description: C1b9. Cerebrovascular accident. Arterial system: altered consciousness

variable.name: IAC1B10
variable.description: C1b10. Cerebrovascular accident. Arterial system: vertigo

variable.name: IAC1B11
variable.description: C1b11. Cerebrovascular accident. Arterial system: nausea

variable.name: IAC2A
variable.description: C2a. Cerebrovascular accident: did symptoms/signs at least 10 min.

variable.name: IAC2B
variable.description: C2b. Cerebrovascular accident: were symptoms/ or signs over 24 hr.

variable.name: IAC3A
variable.description: C3a. Cerebrovascular accident. Was there a persistent abnormality of central nervous system function: neurological examination

variable.name: IAC3B
variable.description: C3b. Cerebrovascular accident. Was there a persistent abnormality of central nervous system function: disability that interferes/activities

variable.name: IAC4
variable.description: C4. Cerebrovascular accident. Was angiography testing performed

variable.name: IAC5
variable.description: C5. Cerebrovascular accident. Diagnostic tests performed

variable.name: IAC5TES1
variable.description: C5. Cerebrovascular accident. Diagnostic tests performed: test 1

variable.name: IAC5RES1
variable.description: C5. Cerebrovascular accident. Diagnostic tests performed: result of test 1

variable.name: IAC5TES2
variable.description: C5. Cerebrovascular accident. Diagnostic tests performed: test 2

variable.name: IAC5RES2
variable.description: C5. Cerebrovascular accident. Diagnostic tests performed: result of test 2

variable.name: IAC5TES3
variable.description: C5. Cerebrovascular accident. Diagnostic tests performed: test 3

variable.name: IAC5RES3
variable.description: C5. Cerebrovascular accident. Diagnostic tests performed: result of test 3

variable.name: IAC5TES4
variable.description: C5. Cerebrovascular accident. Diagnostic tests performed: test 4

variable.name: IAC5RES4
variable.description: C5. Cerebrovascular accident. Diagnostic tests performed: result of test 4

variable.name: IAC5TES5
variable.description: C5. Cerebrovascular accident. Diagnostic tests performed: test 5

variable.name: IAC5RES5
variable.description: C5. Cerebrovascular accident. Diagnostic tests performed: result of test 5

variable.name: FSASDATE
variable.description: A4. Identifying information. Deidentified date form completed

variable.name: MASK_PAT
variable.description: A2. Identifying information. Deidentified patient ID

variable.name: IAB1ADAT
variable.description: B1. Recognition of event. Deidentified date of occurrence

variable.name: IAB2BDAT
variable.description: B2. Recognition of event. Deidentified date clinic learned of the event
